name: Galaxy Union
description: Economic based 4x, puts you in a large galaxy with hundreds of systems as a CEO of a colony destined to rule over all competitors, features dozens or more opponent CEOs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Memory: 500 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 1000 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
